General.Name: Medico Remedies Limited
General.Description: Medico Remedies Limited manufactures and sells pharmaceutical formulations in India. The company offers antibiotics and anti-infectives; beta-lactams- penicillins and cephalosporins; antifungals; vitamins and supplements; cardiovascular products; antipyretic, analgesic, and NSAIDs medicines; antacid and anti-ulcer drugs; antidepressants, antipsychotics, and anti-epileptics; antimalarials; dry syrups; ointments and creams; anti-diabetics; syrups; and miscellaneous products, as well as diuretics, antireterovirals, and steroidal preparations. It primarily exports its products. Medico Remedies Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Mumbai, India.

1.Name: Mr. Harshit Haresh Mehta
1.Title: MD, Marketing & Export Head and Director

2.Title: Production of Technical & Quality Control Head and Whole-Time Director
